title: Product Pulse: Key Insights (Nov 24 - Nov 30, 2025)
overview: This weekly pulse highlights user feedback from November 24-30, 2025. Technical glitches remain a primary concern, frequently affecting core features and data accuracy. Conversely, the application receives positive remarks for its suitability for new investors and a user-friendly interface, positioning it well for market entry.

themes.name: Glitches & Bugs
themes.summary: Users consistently express negative sentiment regarding frequent technical errors, particularly issues with option chains, trending lines, and real-time data accuracy, which significantly impact usability.

themes.name: App Suitability
themes.summary: Users convey positive sentiment towards the application's ease of use and simpler interface, identifying it as an ideal platform for new users beginning their investment portfolios.

quotes: Too much glitch, option chain not open properly sometime working sometime not working.
something went wrong, live values cannot be shown, you are doing this frequently
The right app to get started with your portfolio!
actions: Initiate an urgent sprint to address frequently reported technical glitches, specifically focusing on option chain functionality and trending line accuracy.
Implement improved real-time data validation and error handling to eliminate discrepancies in share price and profit/loss calculations.
Develop targeted onboarding campaigns highlighting the app's simplicity and suitability for new investors, leveraging this positive perception.
